name: Path of the Fire
description:
Game can be played in browser OR downloaded and played on Windows. 
- If playing in browser, please maximize the screen!

--- Premise ---

10,000 years after humanity has gone extinct, monkeys have become the new dominant species. A caravan of them are returning to their village, when suddenly a forest fire breaks out. Using ancient human technology, lead your monkeys back to their village unharmed!

--- Features ---

- Place your monkeys strategically on tiles to combat the wildfire 
- Follow the path home... the screen scrolls automatically, you better keep up or you will have monkey flambe. 
- Manage your limited resources efficiently or you may be left high and dry!

--- More about the project and the team ---

Made for the April 2022 Town One Game Jam, with the theme "Path"
Created by team Monkey Village: 

Made using Unity, C#.
